General_Description: '''A Town in Need, Indeed''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]] and a memory of Layla herself.
Section_Description: After seemingly dispatching Alponos' pirate threat, Kassandra learned from Megakles that she had inadvertently sunk the town's supply ships. With the reinforcements dead, Kassandra is tasked to help a blacksmith, horse breeder, and "legend" to get Alponos' citizens prepared.
Section_Dialogue:
*'''Kassandra:''' ''The pirates are Poseidon's problem now.''
*'''Megakles:''' ''What have you done? Didn't you hear me screaming? You sunk our reinforcements!''

<tabber>
|-|They looked like pirates.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''They sure looked and fought like pirates.''
|-|You never said you had reinforcements.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''You didn't say anything about reinforcements. You said pirates.''
|-|They attacked me.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Those ships attacked me. I fought back. That's what I do.''
</tabber>

*'''Megakles:''' ''I sent a message to the supply ships to disguise their sails. "Look like a pirate and sail in unseen." Those ships had supplies and troops.''

<tabber>
|-|Let me make this right.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''If I'd known they were reinforcements, I wouldn't have attacked. I need to set this right.''
*'''Megakles:''' ''There's still time. If we can get these villagers ready for battle, they can fight off the pirates themselves.''
|-|I'm guessing you're not a general.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''You're not an actual general, are you?''
*'''Megakles:''' ''Not... a... Listen to me, ''misthios''. I've fought in three wars. No training prepares you for this.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''You had no strategy.''
*'''Megakles:''' ''These villagers are as good as slaughtered because of you. But if we can get them ready, they can fight off the pirates themselves.''
|-|You should have said there were reinforcements.=
*'''Kassandra:''' Now ''you tell me.''
*'''Megakles:''' ''Didn't think I had to say, "Don't sink the fucking reinforcements!" Without those troops, we need to get these villagers ready for battle.''
</tabber>

(Then let's get ready to fight.)
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll do it. I don't see an armory, though. Where's the smith?''
*'''Megakles:''' ''He hasn't worked since the last Eagle Bearer was here.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll get him making swords. Can the villagers ride?''
*'''Megakles:''' ''For salt workers, they're not bad. And there's a horse breeder in town.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll talk to them.''
*'''Megakles:''' ''Though we can't just arm them and tell them to fight. There's only one man who can rally the people, claims to be a reborn Ajax the Lesser. Find him and get him back.''

(If players choose, "Where can I find the smith?")
*'''Kassandra:''' ''So where's the blacksmith?''
*'''Megakles:''' ''The forge caught fire. The smith's in the village, but you'll need to help him rebuild before he can work again.''

(If players choose, "What about the horse breeder?")
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Tell me more about the horse breeder.''
*'''Megakles:''' ''She knows horses better than Poseidon. Get her to put a mare under each of these villagers, and we'll have a chance.''

(If players choose, "What about this Ajax?")
*'''Kassandra:''' ''If dead heroes are anything like me, they don't like being impersonated. Are you sure this Ajax guy is a good idea?''
*'''Megakles:''' ''Let the dead judge us all they want. We need to shake the fear out of these villagers. The last time I saw Ajax, he was headed to the hills southwest of here, on the northern border of Phokis.''

(If players choose, "What do you know about my imposter?")
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Tell me what you know about the one using my name.''
*'''Megakles:''' ''He came in with a vicious little bird. Called it... Ikaros? Something like that. Anyway, said he'd help, then made things worse at every turn. So far, you two have a lot in common.''

(Leave this to me.)
*'''Kassandra:''' ''The villagers will be warriors when I'm done.''

After attempting to help all the citizens Megakles mentioned, Kassandra returns to him.
*'''Megakles:''' ''You're back just in time. How's Nikaia? I heard she's trained a stallion for me.''

<tabber>
|-|Nikaia's dead.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Nikaia's dead. She thought your horse was Pegasos and rode it right off a cliff.''
*'''Megakles:''' ''She what? All right. We don't ''need'' horses to fight if we have weapons. How many has Kallipides made?''
|-|She's great. - Lie=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Oh, Nikaia's great. There’s more horses than this village has people.''
*'''Megakles:''' ''She’s as reliable as they come. And Kallipides? Has he armed the villagers?''
</tabber>

<tabber>
|-|Kallipides is dead, too.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Kallipides... had an accident.''
*'''Megakles:''' ''What kind of accident?''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''The really bad kind. He... didn't see some stone blocks. He walked right into them, and -''
*'''Megakles:''' ''Enough. Without weapons, we're doomed.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''We haven't even talked about Ajax yet.''
*'''Megakles:''' ''Did you find him?''
|-|He's made so many weapons. - Lie=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''The villagers are all armed. Every single one. Nothing to worry about there.''
*'''Megakles:''' ''Good! Spilling a little pirate blood on the salt might make it taste better.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''You never know. Now, as for Ajax.''
*'''Megakles:''' ''Tell me he inspired the villagers to make a stand.''
</tabber>

<tabber>
|-|I found Ajax. And then he died.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Ajax had this helmet that he thought would make him immortal...''
*'''Megakles:''' ''And?''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''It didn't.''
*'''Megakles:''' ''Malaka.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Tell me about it.''
*'''Megakles:''' ''I would ask literally anyone else, but what choice do I have? I need ''everyone'' with a blade fighting with me. You can at least ''fight'', can't you?''
|-|We inspired the villagers together. - Lie=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Ajax put on a real show. I’ve never seen anything like it.''
*'''Megakles:''' ''Good! Very good. The villagers are a superstitious type.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''In this village, I can see why.''
*'''Megakles:''' ''You did good. The villagers should be able to defend their homes thanks to you.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''They may still need a bit of help.''
*'''Megakles:''' ''Agreed! We can leave them to defend the village while you and I stop any pirates that are storming the Salts. What do you think?''
</tabber>

(Let's go kill pirates.)
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Let's go.''

<tabber>
(If Kassandra told him the truth)=
*'''Megakles:''' ''Not a lot of people would have been honest with me the way you were. I respect that. I just hope there's still a chance that we can make this right.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I will do everything I can to save these people.''
|-|(If Kassandra lied to him)=
*'''Megakles:''' ''When you sunk those ships, I thought we were as good as dead. But you did well, getting these villagers ready to fight.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Right, well... It was the least I could do.''
</tabber>
Section_Outcome: Kassandra tried helping out a horse breeder, blacksmith and local hero. Unfortunately, her efforts were futile and [[Kallipides]], [[Nikaia]] and [[Ajax the Lesser (imposter)|Ajax the Lesser]] died.
